name: Slow Feeder Dog Bowl
imageAlt: Non-slip slow feeder dog bowl with maze pattern to prevent fast eating
shortDescription: Slow down your speed-eater and make mealtime a healthy, enriching puzzle.
description: Does your dog inhale their food in 30 seconds flat? This maze-patterned slow feeder bowl turns meals into a fun challenge, extending eating time by up to 10x. Slower eating means better digestion, less bloating, and a mentally stimulated pup. The non-slip base stays put even with the most enthusiastic eaters.
features: Maze pattern extends mealtime by up to 10x for healthier digestion
Non-slip rubber base prevents sliding on tiles and hard floors
BPA-free, food-grade plastic safe for daily use
Dishwasher-safe for quick and easy cleaning
Holds up to 500ml of wet or dry food
